Hours later you awake, stiff and shaking fromthe cold. Cautiously you pull off your blindfold.Your captors are gone. All around you is darkbrown clay. There are no trees, no water, and noshelter from the cold wind that blows across thevast, empty plain. So this is your intended fateâ€”you will be left to die of exposure under the BlackSun. It's a long trek across the desert of the Under-ground Kingdom, but if you can only reach sometrees, you may be able to find a warm place torest. Somehow you know that you'll make it, ifyou have the will. Do you?

The End
